resources.string: Good evening, if your have substantial experience in online work, please forward your name and phone number to me. We need trainers for our Ajira platform. Thank you

We need an intern in Capacity Development, prefereably a lady so as to achive the gender balance goals. If you are interested, please reply with your full name and contact information. We are working on more placements. Thank you for your patience.

Good morning, Blessed here. If you are interested in learning about bitcoin mining please reply to this message. Please add your contact information and the current capacity of your laptop/computer if you own one. We need twenty people, we have seven so far. Have a good day.
Icta autogenerated notification.> This is a quick reminder to fill in your daily progrees report. Keep learning. :)
